name: Bit Adventure
description:
This Game was made in a Game Studio class at CCM as a a final project. The Game was made in a time period of 7 weeks. Bit Adventure is a fun adventure game with bullet hell style fighting.  In Bit Adventure you can get and complete Quests, Kill monsters and get loot, Gear up and Level up, you can even Kill a final boss. All in a open world map, meaning you can do things in the order you want. Have fun Exploring the world of Bit Adventure

Special Thanks to Kristian!
